00004 class LeftPanel(wx.Panel):

00008 
00009         self.SetBackgroundColour('WHITE')
00010         self.SetFont(wx.Font(9, wx.SWISS, wx.NORMAL,wx.FONTWEIGHT_BOLD))
00011         self.gaWindow = parent.GetParent()
00012 
00013         yaml = gaParams.getYaml()
00014         f = open('config/guiconfig.yml', 'r')
00015         widgets = yaml.load(f)
00016         widgets = widgets['widgets']
00017         f.close()

00019         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00020         self.sizer.Add((10, 14))
00021 
00022         # Population size label
00023         self.sizer.Add(wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Population Size:'), 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER)
00024         # Population size slider
00025         self.populationSlider = wx.Slider(self, -1, size=(100, 40), style= wx.SL_LABELS | wx.SL_AUTOTICKS)
00026         max = int(widgets['population']['max'])
00027         min = int(widgets['population']['min'])
00028         self.populationSlider.SetRange(min, max)
00029         self.populationSlider.SetValue(gaParams.getVar('population_size'))
00030 
00031         self.sizer.Add(self.populationSlider, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER)
00032         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SCROLL, self.onPopulationChange, self.populationSlider)
00033 
00034         xoRate, mutRate = gaParams.getGARates()
00035         # XO Rate Slider
00036         self.xoRateSlider = wx.Slider(self, -1, size = (100, 40), style = wx.SL_LABELS | wx.SL_AUTOTICKS)
00037         max = int(widgets['crossover']['max'])
00038         min = int(widgets['crossover']['min'])
00039         self.xoRateSlider.SetRange(min, max)
00040         self.xoRateSlider.SetValue(xoRate * max)
00041 
00042         # Add xo slider to sizer
00043         self.sizer.Add((10, 10))
00044         self.sizer.Add(wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Crossover Rate:'), 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER)
00045         self.sizer.Add(self.xoRateSlider, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER)
00046 
00047         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SCROLL, self.onCrossoverChange, self.xoRateSlider)
00048 
00049         # Mutation Rate
00050         self.mutBox = wx.TextCtrl(self, -1, size = (50, -1))
00051         self.mutBox.SetValue("%.3f" % mutRate)
00052

00054         tempSizer.Add(wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Mutation:'), 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL)

00064         self.sizer.Add((10, 10))
00065 
00066         # Step size spinner control
00067         self.stepSize = wx.SpinCtrl(self, wx.ID_ANY, size = (50,23))
00068         self.stepSize.SetRange(1, 300)
00069         step = gaParams.getVar('stepSize') or 1
00070         self.stepSize.SetValue(step)
00071 
00072         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SPINCTRL, self.onSpin, self.stepSize)
00073 
00074         # Add spinner with text label to sizer
00075         tempSizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00076         tempSizer.Add(wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Step Size:'), 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL)
00077         tempSizer.Add(self.stepSize)

00079 
00080         ## 8px spaces for widgets in same group, 10px for widgets not in the same group
00081 
00082         self.sizer.Add((10, 18))
00083 
00084         peers = {}
00085         peer_list = gaParams.getVar('peers')
00086         online = wx.Bitmap('gui/online.png')
00087         offline = wx.Bitmap('gui/offline.png')
00088         for peer in peer_list:
00089             peer_sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00090             peer_status = wx.StaticBitmap(self)
00091             peer_status.SetBitmap(offline)
00092             peer_name = wx.StaticText(self, -1, peer)
00093             peer_sizer.Add(peer_status)
00094             peer_sizer.Add(peer_name)
00095             self.sizer.Add(peer_sizer)
00096             peers[peer] = peer_status
00097                 
00098         self.peers = peers
00099         self.status_bitmap = {}
00100         self.status_bitmap['online'] = online
00101         self.status_bitmap['offline'] = offline
00102 
00103         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00104         self.SetAutoLayout(True)
00105         self.sizer.Layout()
00106         self.sizer.Fit(self)
00107         self.sizer.SetSizeHints(self)
00108         self.Layout()

00110 
00111         # Keeps the textbox from having the default focus, which was annoying
00112         self.SetFocus()
00113 
00114         self.timestamp = 0.

00118     def onPopulationChange(self, event):
00119         '''
00120         Population slider event handler.
00121         '''
00122         popSize = self.populationSlider.GetValue()
00123         gaParams.setVar('population_size', popSize)
00124 
00125         #self.gaWindow.setPopSize(popSize)
00126 
00127 #-------------------------------------------#
00128     def onStop(self):
00129         self.populationSlider.Enable(True)
00130 
00131 #-------------------------------------------#
00132     def onRun(self):
00133         self.populationSlider.Enable(False)
00134 
00135 #-------------------------------------------#
00136     def onCrossoverChange(self, event):
00137         xoRate = self.xoRateSlider.GetValue()
00138         gaParams.setVar('crossover_prob', xoRate/100.0)
00139 
00140 #-------------------------------------------#
00141     def onMutationChange(self, event):
00142         rate_str = self.mutBox.GetValue().strip()
00143         if rate_str and not rate_str=='.':
00144             rate = float(rate_str)
00145         else:
00146             rate = 0.0
00147         gaParams.setVar('mutation_prob', rate)
00148 
00149 #-------------------------------------------#
00150     def onSpin(self, event):
00151         spin = self.stepSize.GetValue()
00152         gaParams.setVar('stepSize', spin)
00153         self.right.setStepSize(spin)
00154 
00155 #-------------------------------------------#
00156     def peerStatus(self, peer_status):
00157         '''
00158         Update the status icon of peer list.
00159         '''
00160         for peer, status in peer_status:
00161             self.peers[peer].SetBitmap(self.status_bitmap[status])
